reference.shortdesc: A phrase is a small group of words that stand together as a unit, typically forming a component of a clause.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The ph element often is used to enclose a phrase for reuse or conditional processing.

The ph element frequently is used as a specialization base, to create phrase-level markup that can provide additional semantic meaning or trigger specific processing or formatting. For example, all highlighting domain elements are specializations of ph.
